title: Newly renovated 3 bedroom. Modern, spacious, and available 9/15!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', "We don't just rent apartments.", "From the moment you walk through the front door you'll feel the comfort that makes our residents happy to call us home.", 'Cutting edge amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds, and a dedicated staff contributes to a higher standard of living.', 'Unique three bedroom with two full bathrooms, a walk-in closet, vanity area and accommodating kitchen pantry.', 'Details', 'Pet Info: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 55lbs', 'Monthly Pet Rent Per Pet: $35 | $400 Deposit and $200 Fee | Max Number of Pets: 2', 'A pet interview is required.', 'Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.', 'Amenities', 'Utilities Cost:Resident Pays', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type: Garage, Covered, On-Street', 'Parking notes: None', 'Appliances: Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior: Balcony/patio, Pond, Sprinkler system', 'Heating/cooling: Ceiling fans', 'Wiring: Cable-ready', 'Facilities and Recreation: Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Playground, Business center, Tennis court, Basketball court, Sports court', 'Security and Access: Security system, Controlled access, Gated entry', 'Views: City, Mountain', 'Additional features: Fireplace, Vaulted ceiling, Jacuzzi, Sauna, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'Meridian Pointe Apartments', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
